paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant c.849dupT, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: A novel mutation (c.849dupT) in BRCA2 was identified in a female patient and her unaffected brothers.
A novel mutation (c.849dupT) in BRCA2 was identified in a female patient and her unaffected brothers.
A novel mutation (c.849dupT) in BRCA2 was identified in a female patient and her unaffected brothers.

functional_data.summary: This mutation leads to the truncation of BRCA2 functional domains and significantly reduces BRCA2 mRNA expression levels.

variants.segregation_data: This mutation is strongly associated with familial breast cancer.
variants.additional_notes: The effects of this BRCA2 mutation on drug resistance should be taken into consideration during treatment.
key_quotes: This mutation leads to the truncation of BRCA2 functional domains.
BRCA2 mRNA expression levels in mutation carriers are significantly reduced compared to noncarriers.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
